pipeline.tools package

Submodules

pipeline.tools.file_checker module

class pipeline.tools.file_checker.FileChecker[source]

Bases: object

classmethod check_files()[source]

Will call all the defined functions

classmethod check_for_log_dir_and_file()[source]

Will check for the logs subdirectory. If it doesn’t exist, it will be created along with the log file. :return: Success in the checking :rtype: bool

classmethod check_for_output_subdirectory()[source]

Will check for the pipeline output subdirectory. Will create it if it does not exist. :return: Success in the checking :rtype: bool

classmethod get_current_output_subdirectory()[source]

Will create the subdirectory in which the output for the pipeline excecution will be saved. This directory will be named after the moment of execution within a folder with the current date. :return: Output directory :rtype: String

pipeline.tools.record_audio module

pipeline.tools.strategy_navigator module

class pipeline.tools.strategy_navigator.StrategyNavigator[source]

Bases: object

Auxiliary tool to list and retrieve strategy class references. This tool will be used to update the context reference to one strategy.

classmethod get_concrete_strategy_class(strategy_type: str, module_name: str)[source]

Fetches a reference to a concrete strategy. As the strategies’ execute method is a classmethod, it can be called directly from the reference.

Parameters

  • strategy_type (str) – Desired strategy type

  • module_name (str) – Concrete module within the strategy type

Returns

Class reference to the strategy

Return type

class

classmethod list_concrete_strategies(strategy_type: str) → list[source]

List the implemented strategies within a strategy type. For example, can list the implemented spell checking strategies.

Parameters

strategy_type (str) – Desired strategy type to expand

Returns

List containing the module names of the implemented strategies

Return type

list

classmethod list_strategies() → list[source]

Lists the different strategy types that constitute the pipeline.

Returns

List containing the package names of the different strategies used

Return type

list

pipeline.tools.text_file_handler module

class pipeline.tools.text_file_handler.TextFileHandler[source]

Bases: object

Class that will abstract the IO to text files.

classmethod read_text_file(path: str) → str[source]

Reads the content of a (hopefully) text file and returns it as a string.

Parameters

path (str) – Path to text file

Returns

The string that was read

Return type

str

classmethod write_to_text_file(path: str, filename: str, text: str) → bool[source]

Writes a string object to a text file. The file is not supposed to exist.

Parameters

  • path (str) – Path to the directory the text file will be in

  • filename (str) – Name of the file (e.g. transcription, hl7_output, spellcheck…)

  • text (str) – Content of the text file

Returns

Whether the operation was successfull

Return type

bool
